newsitem.title: USA: Andal chairman and president retire.
newsitem.headline: Andal chairman and president retire.

text.p: Andal Corp said on Friday it Chairman Andrew Frankel and President Alan Cohen retired from those offices effective August 31.
The company said Peter Flood, president of its Multi-Arc Inc subsidiary, has been elected chairman and president.
Flood will also continue to serve as a director of Andal, the company said.

The company also said Walter Kreil, Jr., vice president and chief financial officer of Multi-Arc, was elected senior vice president and chief financial officer of Andal and was elected to Andal's board.
"Since Multi-Arc has been the core of the business for several years, it seemed reasonable to consolidate management responsibilites in Multi-Arc personnel," Kreil said in a telephone interview.
In connection with the changes, Andal headquarters will move to the Multi-Arc facility in Rockaway, New Jersey, a statement from the company said.
The company said Frankel and Cohen will continue as directors of Andal.

The company said Frankel and Cohen have assumed the lease on Andal's New York City office and certain other office costs; and Andal has agreed to issue 32,500 shares of its common stock each to Frankel and Cohen.
